title: Hodoyoshi 1
text: Hodoyoshi 1 is a Japanese 60 kg-class <a href="Microsatellite%20%28spaceflight%29">microsatellite</a>. It was launched on 6 November 2014 by a <a href="Dnepr%20%28rocket%29">Dnepr</a> rocket into the 500 km sun-synchronous orbit along with <a href="Asnaro-1">Asnaro-1</a> and other microsatellites.
